title: adware downloads
extract: Adware, or "advertising-supported software", refers to any piece of software or application that displays advertisements, usually through pop-up or pop-under windows. ... Many users get adware by downloading freeware like toolbars, HD wallpapers, or widgets on PCs, or unwittingly downloading them through mobile apps.
extract_html: Adware, or "advertising-supported software", refers to any piece of software or application that displays advertisements, usually through pop-up or pop-under windows. ...
